constraints.name: subsequence_constraint
constraints.description: 子数组是通过从数组的开头和结尾删除若干元素（可能为零）得到的连续子序列
constraints.formal: A[L ... R] where 1 ≤ L ≤ R ≤ N

constraints.name: max_subarray_sum
constraints.description: 子数组的最大子数组和等于该子数组中所有连续子段和的最大值
constraints.formal: max(B_L + B_{L+1} + ... + B_R) for all 1 ≤ L ≤ R ≤ M
